name: Insert Video with Schema.org (IVS)
author: Artem Abramovich

sections.description:
The plugin allows to speed up and simplify the process of partitioning a video from YouTube about writing articles.
Click on the button and fill in all fields. Click on the “Ok” button and you’re done.
For the correct operation of the microdata, all the fields in the Add microdata section are mandatory for filling

Demo video

Bundled translations:

  • Russian
  • English

Donate link:

https://www.paypal.me/artabr

Got a bug or suggestion?

  • Documentation
  • Contact author (please DO NOT use this form for support requests)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the insert-video-with-schemaorg-ivws folder to the to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do you only need to insert video data manually?

Yes

Is it possible to automatically add video at once with the data?

Yes, it is possible. But this is the functional of another paid plugin
